LanguageData.IrrigationSprinkler.label: irrigation sprinkler
LanguageData.IrrigationSprinkler.description: Waters the surrounding area once every morning to improve the fertility of the soil through the day. Uses 1000L each morning at max radius.
LanguageData.IrrigationSprinkler_Blueprint.label: irrigation sprinkler (blueprint)
LanguageData.IrrigationSprinkler_Frame.label: irrigation sprinkler (building)
LanguageData.IrrigationSprinkler_Frame.description: Waters the surrounding area once every morning to improve the fertility of the soil through the day. Uses 1000L each morning at max radius.
LanguageData.FireSprinkler.label: fire sprinkler
LanguageData.FireSprinkler.description: Triggered by fire or high temperature. Douses flames with a spray of water.
LanguageData.FireSprinkler_Blueprint.label: fire sprinkler (blueprint)
LanguageData.FireSprinkler_Blueprint_Install.label: fire sprinkler (blueprint)
LanguageData.FireSprinkler_Frame.label: fire sprinkler (building)
LanguageData.FireSprinkler_Frame.description: Triggered by fire or high temperature. Douses flames with a spray of water.
LanguageData.BiosolidsComposter.label: biosolids composter
LanguageData.BiosolidsComposter.description: A composter for turning sewage into fertilizer for increasing the fertility of diggable terrain.
LanguageData.BiosolidsComposter_Blueprint.label: biosolids composter (blueprint)
LanguageData.BiosolidsComposter_Frame.label: biosolids composter (building)
LanguageData.BiosolidsComposter_Frame.description: A composter for turning sewage into fertilizer for increasing the fertility of diggable terrain.
